member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Connector.BotAuthentication.MicrosoftAppId
member.remarks: Needs to be used with MicrosoftAppPassword. Ignored if CredentialProviderType is specified.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Connector.BotAuthentication.MicrosoftAppPassword
member.summary: Microsoft AppPassword for the bot (needs to be used with MicrosoftAppId)
member.remarks: Needs to be used with MicrosoftAppId. Ignored if CredentialProviderType is specified.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Connector.BotAuthentication.MicrosoftAppIdSettingName
member.summary: Name of Setting in web.config which has the Microsoft AppId for the bot
member.remarks: Needs to be used with MicrosoftAppPasswordSettingName. Ignored if CredentialProviderType is specified.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Connector.BotAuthentication.MicrosoftAppPasswordSettingName
member.summary: Name of Setting in web.config which has the Microsoft App Password for the bot
member.remarks: Needs to be used with MicrosoftAppIdSettingName. Ignored if CredentialProviderType is specified.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Connector.BotAuthentication.CredentialProviderType
member.summary: Type which implements ICredentialProvider interface to allow multiple bot AppIds to be registered for the same endpoint

member.name: T:Microsoft.Bot.Connector.SettingsCredentialProvider
member.summary: Credential provider which uses config settings to lookup appId and password
